MY WORKS
Bitcoin CLI Wallet

A simple yet highly efficient Bitcoin CLI wallet that allows you to create Bitcoin addresses, load wallets, send and receive transactions. This project is using the bitcoin-core RPC API.

Bitcoin Core CLI Python
Mempool iPhone App

An iPhone app that lets you search for txs, addresses and recent/pending blocks on the bitcoin network. (Still in development)
